name: Day & Night (Revolution Game)
description:
Created for Game Clone Game Jam!!!.

Some people prefers day, while others prefer night. However, they must coexist everyday to balance everything out! In Day & Night, control the sun and the moon to let them reach the end, without losing either one of them. I will update the game if this receives a decent amount of feedback, or I guess this would be it for now.

Check this out maybe
